# 模型基础

```{r}
library(modelr)
options(na.action = na.warn)

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
ggplot(sim1, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
# 一种更方便的创建 tbl dataframe 的方式
models <- tibble(
  a1 = runif(250, -20, 40),
  a2 = runif(250, -5, 5)
)

ggplot(sim1, aes(x, y)) + 
  geom_abline(aes(intercept = a1, slope = a2), data = models, alpha = 1/4) + 
  geom_point()
```
